x.description: The x velocity value to use for the comparison.
x.markdownDescription: The x velocity value to use for the comparison.

y.description: The y velocity value to use for the comparison.
y.markdownDescription: The y velocity value to use for the comparison.

z.description: The z velocity value to use for the comparison.
z.markdownDescription: The z velocity value to use for the comparison.

axes.description: The axes that should be used for the comparison.
axes.markdownDescription: The axes that should be used for the comparison.

comparison.description: How the `axes`' velocity should be compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: How the `axes`' velocity should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value for the axes specified in `axes` to compare to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: The value for the axes specified in `axes` to compare to.
